rooms.description: Spacious living area with exposed concrete and minimalistic Brutalist design elements.
Adjacent to the kitchen, designed for family gatherings while maintaining Vastu alignment.
Modern Brutalist kitchen with functional layout and efficient space utilization.
Luxurious master suite positioned in the northeast to align with Vastu for prosperity, featuring an ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet.
Four equally sized bedrooms on the east side, following Vastu principles for harmony and privacy.
Dedicated servant's quarters located towards the west to maintain privacy yet convenient access. Includes a small living area and attached bathroom.
Integrated home theater on the north side of the ground floor, designed with acoustic optimization in mind and respecting Vastu's recommendation for entertainment spaces.
Multi-purpose storage and utility area for cleaning supplies and appliances.

openings.description: Main entrance with reinforced concrete doors complementing the Brutalist aesthetic, located in the south as per Vastu principles for auspicious energy.
Open balcony adjacent to the living area providing ventilation and natural light while ensuring privacy.
Vertical circulation element connecting levels with minimalist design and safety features, positioned according to Vastu for energy flow.
